known_issues: Deleting a card from the card gallery triggers an error instead of deleting and updating the portfolio.

existing_features.title: Fix the error that occurs when deleting a card from the card gallery so that the card is actually deleted and the UI remains stable (no uncaught errors / error overlays).
Extend the card edit dialog to allow changing the sale price when the card already has a sale price (i.e., salePrice is present), and ensure the portfolio metrics update accordingly after saving.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix error when deleting a card from the card gallery; ensure the card is deleted and changes are reflected in the portfolio
Allow editing a card's sale price (if present) when editing a card; update the portfolio accordingly
